original_contract.title: Cinderella
original_contract.logline: A young girl overcomes adversity with magical help to find true love with a prince.

characters.name: Cinderella
characters.motivation: Find true love and escape her miserable life

plot_beats.description: A call to adventure is announced
Protagonist is aided by a magical helper
Protagonist meets and falls in love with the love interest
Protagonist faces a time constraint and must make a hasty exit
The love interest searches for the protagonist

context_map.new_logline: A young student overcomes academic adversity with help from a wise mentor to achieve a prestigious scholarship and find love with a talented classmate.

characters.description: A kind and hardworking student facing difficulties in her studies due to family constraints.
A benevolent professor who recognizes Riya's potential and provides her with academic guidance and support.
A charming and intelligent student who becomes Riya's love interest and study partner.

setting.rules: Admission to a top university is highly competitive, and students must score high in exams to secure scholarships.

plot_outline: Riya discovers the announcement for a highly competitive scholarship exam, which sparks her desire to pursue higher education.
Professor Rao takes Riya under her wing, providing her with specialized coaching and study materials to help her prepare for the exam.
Riya meets Aryan during a study group session, and they start working together, leading to a romantic connection.
As the exam date approaches, Riya faces a time constraint to complete her preparations and must make a difficult choice between her studies and personal life.
Aryan searches for Riya after she misses a crucial study session, and they finally confess their feelings for each other after the exam results are announced.
